about_the_game:
Game Content
This is an action game that combines wisdom and courage. In the game, you will play the role of a chicken hero who guards the homeland, relying on both hands and feet to destroy the invading enemies. While avoiding and fighting against a steady stream of enemies, you can also cleverly use the talents of the enemies to learn from the barbarian's skills to control the barbarians.

Game Control
Use keyborad w,s,a,d to control your movement
Use mouse left clilk to attack

Game feature
Avoiding Traps
Puzzle solving elements
Cartoon avatar

name: C17

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel Core I7-7700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Use keyboard and mouse to control characters to avoid monster attacks
